#Taylor Expansion
f(a) + f'(a)(x-a) + (f''(a)/2!)(x-a)^2 + (f'''(a)/3!)(x-a)^3 + ...

f(x) = 1/(1-x) = (1-x)^-1
f'(x) = 1/(1-x)^2
* 1/(1-a) + (x-a)/(1-a)^2 + (x-a)^2 / (1-a)^3 *

f(x) = e^x
f'(x) = e^x
* e^a * (1 + (x-a) + (1/2)(x-a)^2 + (1/6)(x-a)^3 ...) *

f(x) = ln(1+x)
f'(x) = 1/(x+1)
f''(x) = -1/(x+1)^2
* ln(1+a) + (x-a)/(x+1) + (-2/((x-a)(x+1)^2) *)
